code: import{getRandomInt}from'../../store/utils/utils';export var ArrayBox=[{id:'001',name:'auto',image:'quiz/auto.png',view:false},{id:'002',name:'capra',image:'quiz/capra.png',view:false},{id:'003',name:'capra',image:'quiz/capra.png',view:false}];export var shuffleArray=function shuffleArray(){var arrayTemp=ArrayBox;for(var i=arrayTemp.length-1;i>0;i--){var j=Math.floor(Math.random()*(i+1));var temp=arrayTemp[i];arrayTemp[i]=arrayTemp[j];arrayTemp[j]=temp;}return arrayTemp;};export var mixPrizeArray=function mixPrizeArray(){var num=getRandomInt(3);var arrayPrize=[];for(var i=0;i<3;i++){if(num===i){arrayPrize[i]=1;}else arrayPrize[i]=0;}return arrayPrize;};
